events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund because it doesn't fit and I would like my money back.
The customer requests a refund for a purchased jacket due to sizing issues and dissatisfaction with fit.
Customer support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle this refund request regarding the jacket.
